[/php]

“Fatal error: Call to a member function getPDO() on a non-object”

Do I really have to go as far do more look like $pdo = $config->getPDO(); $pdo->prepare(); ?

EDIT:
That actually didn’t work either. Now it is pretending that $pdo is a non-object.

$pdo = $config->getPDO();

function penis() {
$pdo->prepare(nigs);
…
}
